alert.note: Alert for Greensville (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Northampton and south central Greensville Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 929 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dahlia, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, cloud to ground lightning, and heavy rain.. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seaboard around 1010 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Turners Crossroads, Bryants Corner, Pleasant Hill, Lanes Corner and Gumberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
